Bali Punya Polisi Pariwisata, Apa Tugasnya?
01 Nov 2019, 11:41 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Sebagai destinasi wisata top Indonesia, Bali rupanya memiliki polisi khusus yang bertugas menjaga keamanan para wisatawan yang datang berlibur. Polisi ini juga dibekali kemampuan bahasa asing. Apa saja tugasnya?
"Sudah lama ada polisi pariwisata, yang sekarang di bawah naungan Ditpamobvit Polda Bali," kata Kombes Hengky Widjaja lewat pesan singkat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Sebagai destinasi wisata dunia, tak dipungkiri banyak turis asing yang berbuat onar di Bali. Kasus-kasus seperti penganiayaan maupun pencurian hingga skimming di Bali banyak yang melibatkan bule.
Keberadaan polisi pariwisata ini pun dirasa penting untuk memberikan pelayanan bagi para wisatawan yang liburan ke Bali. Beberapa destinasi wisata seperti kawasan Kuta maupun objek-objek vital di Pulau Dewata tak luput dari pengawasan polisi pariwisata ini.
"Main job-nya adalah pelayanan masyarakat di tempat/objek vital, di antaranya tempat pariwisata," jelas Hengky.
Hengky mengatakan para polisi pariwisata ini juga mempunyai tugas untuk penegakan hukum. Hanya saja mereka dibekali kemampuan bahasa asing.
"Iya, melaksanakan tugas kepolisian umum seperti biasa. Tapi dibekali kemampuan lebih, yaitu bahasa asing," tuturnya.

Bali Has A Tourism Police, What's Its Job?
Nov 1 2019, 11:41 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - As Indonesia's top tourist destination, Bali apparently has a special police on duty to protect the safety of tourists who come on vacation. The police are also equipped with foreign language skills. What are the tasks?
"There has been a long time tourism police, which is now under the auspices of the Bali Police Ditpamobvit," said Commissioner Hengky Widjaja via text message on Friday (11/01/2019).
As a world tourist destination, no doubt many foreign tourists who do mischief in Bali. Many cases such as persecution or theft to skimming in Bali involve foreigners.
The existence of the tourism police is also considered important to provide services for tourists who vacation in Bali. Some tourist destinations such as the Kuta area and vital objects on the Island of the Gods did not escape the supervision of this tourism police.
"Main job is community service at vital places / objects, including tourism sites," Hengky explained.
Hengky said the tourism police also had a duty to enforce the law. It's just that they are equipped with foreign language skills.
"Yes, carrying out the duties of the general police as usual. But equipped with more capabilities, namely foreign languages," he said.
